shape

Interface MoveableShape

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CarShape, FrogShape

    public interface MoveableShape
    Provides an interface for shapes and images that can be moved around in a JFrame. This is a modified version of the book's MoveableShape class. * @author Andrew Markley * @author Cory W. Cordell

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
      Displays the MoveableShape.
      int getHeight()
      Get the height of the MoveableShape object.
      int getWidth()
      Get the width of the MoveableShape object.
      int getXPosition()
      The upper left corner's x-coordinate.
      int getYPosition()
      The upper left corner's y-coordinate.
      void translate(int dx, int dy)
      Moves the shape by a given amount.

             int dy)
        Moves the shape by a given amount.
        Parameters:
